title: China's "Game of Thrones" Gambit & Democrats' Fox News Dilemma | Ava DuVernay
itunes:title: China's "Game of Thrones" Gambit & Democrats' Fox News Dilemma | Ava DuVernay
description:
U.S.-China trade tensions cause a "Game of Thrones" blackout, 2020 Democratic candidates take different approaches to Fox News, and Ava DuVernay discusses "When They See Us."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
